member.name: M:TurnInProcessAutomation.MainframeDAL.EcommSetupCreateDao.GetCFGDefaultShipDays(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int16,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the default ship days for the parameters passed.
member.returns: Returns the default ship days defined for the CFG in the TMS900Parameter table
member.remarks: If there are multiple vendor style numbers passed, then department will be ignored. Otherwise nothing will be returned if the vendor styles are from two different deparments.

member.name: M:TurnInProcessAutomation.MainframeDAL.EcommSetupCreateDao.GetApprovedEcommSetupCreateDetail(System.Decimal,System.DateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calls the stored procedure to get color level results for the ISN passed
member.param: ISN for which color level results to be retrieved
Start ship date to be matched with PO ship date
Indicator to decide the items (Approved, not approved or both) to be retrieved
member.returns: Returns the color level results for the ISN passed
